invalid_policy_names: High priority requests cannot be rejected on grounds of inactive user.
Priority 1 task derivative records cannot be cancelled, closed or rejected. They can only be resolved.
Moving an US-based asset to a different country requires approval first.
Users should not be assigned with the same role as their managers.
A problem should always have an assigned user.
A user should not be assigned with more than 3 active incidents at a time.
